# Bestial Climber (Ex)
## Overview
*Bestial Climber (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian gains a natural climb speed equal to her land speed. A barbarian must have the [[Raging Climber (Ex)|raging climber]] rage power and be at least 6th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 26
